description: Find out how much Chicago buildings pollute! This public tool helps citizens understand building emissions in the city.
Built with a modern Jamstack approach using Gridsome and Vue.

hero.alt: a screenshot of the front page of the electrify chicago project

text.information: We sourced emissions data from public records and aggregated them using Python and Pandas. The data pipeline ensures regular updates and accuracy.
The front-end allows users to search, filter, and explore emissions by neighborhood or building. Performance and clarity were a top priority.

image.alt: a screenshot of the front page of the electrify chicago project

text.information: This project was built in collaboration with local data scientists and environmental advocates. Contributions are welcome through our GitHub repository.
